pr_title: Warn about unlicensed realms if no auth token can be extracted

timeline.message: Add warnings for unlicensed realms when no authentication token can be extracted

timeline.body:
Can we avoid the `token` word? It leads people to look at the token service and ....

In the section below we say `No valid credentials found` which is terminology that could probably be adapted to work here.
```suggestion
                logger.warn("No authentication credential could be extracted using realms [{}]." +
```
timeline.bodyText:
Can we avoid the token word? It leads people to look at the token service and ....
In the section below we say No valid credentials found which is terminology that could probably be adapted to work here.
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            logger.warn("No authentication token can be extracted using realms [{}]." +
          
          
            
                            logger.warn("No authentication credential could be extracted using realms [{}]." +
timeline.bodyHTML:
Can we avoid the token word? It leads people to look at the token service and ....

In the section below we say No valid credentials found which is terminology that could probably be adapted to work here.

Suggested change
logger.warn("No authentication token can be extracted using realms [{}]." +
logger.warn("No authentication credential could be extracted using realms [{}]." +
timeline.author: tvernum
